amendment.description: To increase the minimum percentage of funds allocated for authorized hazardous fuel reduction projects in the wildland-urban interface.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2043 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 34. Record Vote Number: 424.

Amendment SA 2043 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR 10/31/2003 S13617-13621; text: CR 10/31/2003 S13617) To increase the minimum percentage of funds allocated for authorized hazardous fuel reduction projects in the wildland-urban interface.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2043 proposed by Senator Boxer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2043 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 34. Record Vote Number: 424.
